translation.en: Calling all trains!
translation.it: UNA SERIE ORIGINALE NETFLIX Treni a raccolta!

translation.en: ♪ All aboard, let's make tracks ♪
translation.it: Tutti a bordo! A tutto gas!

translation.en: ♪ Mighty Express ♪
♪ Mighty strong and mighty fast ♪
♪ Mighty, Mighty Express ♪
♪ Put our crew to the test ♪ ♪ Mighty Express ♪
translation.it: Metti alla prova il nostro equipaggio, Mighty Express

translation.en: ♪ It's mighty time ♪
♪ All aboard, we're on our way ♪
♪ Mighty fast to save the day ♪
♪ Mega mission to the max ♪
♪ Let's make tracks ♪
♪ Mighty Express ♪♪
[Nate] Mighty trains race!
♪ Delivering balls to the kids at school ♪ ♪ Kids at school, kids at school ♪
translation.it: Consegno i palloni ai bambini a scuola

translation.en: ♪ Loads to play with and it's super cool ♪ ♪ Super cool ♪♪
translation.it: Un sacco di cose con cui giocare ed è bellissimo

translation.en: Chugga-chugga zoom!
Where's he going in such a hurry?
Let's follow him and find out. Maybe we can be tricky!
translation.it: Seguiamolo e scopriamolo. Potremmo essere furbi.

translation.en: [singing] And sneaky!
Jazz hands!
[Ricky] Fastest bullet train, coming through!
translation.it: Treno ad alta velocità in arrivo!

translation.en: [Nate] Approaching School Station!
[Nate] I've got a delivery of bouncy balls!
translation.it: Ho una consegna di palle rimbalzine.

translation.en: Ooh, ooh! Did my special volleyball come?
I think so. Let's see!
Yes! You're the best, Nate! And your extend-o car's totally awesome!
translation.it: Sì! Sei il migliore, Nate! E il tuo vagone è fantastico!

translation.en: [Stella] That explendo-bendo car thingy is kinda awesome!
Really awesome! Now what are they doing?
Ah! Giant furry thingy! Ugh...
Why do animals love us so much? No respect for privacy.
translation.it: Perché gli animali ci amano così tanto? Nessun rispetto per la privacy.

translation.en: Totally.
-Oh, hi, Red! -Hi, Nate!
I'm just here to make sure the balls get delivered in a safe and orderly manner.
translation.it: Devo assicurarmi che la consegna avvenga in modo sicuro.

translation.en: What could go wrong? I'll unload them!
translation.it: Cosa può andare storto? Ci penso io.

translation.en: Wait, Nate, those containers are too big to pick up at the same time!
translation.it: Aspetta! I contenitori sono troppo grandi per sollevarli insieme.

translation.en: Nah, I've got it!
It's the end of the world!
Switching hose car from water to air!
translation.it: Cambio idrante da acqua ad aria!

translation.en: Rescue Red to the rescue!
Halt, balls!
Not today, ball!
Gotcha!
[Ricky] Ooh, that train car Red has is cool, too.
translation.it: Anche il vagone di Red è allettante.

translation.en: It sure is! We should have cool train cars like that!
translation.it: Eccome. Dovremmo avere dei vagoni così.

translation.en: Phew! Thanks, Red!
Happy to help, Jaden.
-[microphone feedback] -Calling all trains!
Please report to the Busy Board for today's Mega Mission!
translation.it: Alla Bacheca delle attività per la Mega Missione!

translation.en: [both] It's Mighty Time!
Hm... I have an idea! Head to Mission Station, Ricky.
translation.it: Ho un'idea! Vai alla Stazione della Missione, Ricky.

translation.en: I have a sneaky way to trick Nate, and get all their cargo cars for us!
translation.it: Conosco un modo subdolo per ingannare Nate e prenderci tutti i loro vagoni.

translation.en: Sneaky and tricky?!
Those are my two favourite words!
[singing] It's tricky time!
Today's Mega Mission goes to...
translation.it: La Mega Missione di oggi è per…

translation.en: -[Max] Freight Nate! -Chugga-chugga zoom!
[Max] You'll pick up feed for the farm animals at Port Station
translation.it: Prendi il mangime per animali alla Stazione del Porto

translation.en: and deliver it to Farm Station.
translation.it: e consegnalo alla Stazione della Fattoria.

translation.en: Freight Nate is never late! Because I go fast, fast, faster!
translation.it: Montacarichi Nate non è mai in ritardo! Perché vado veloce, veloce, velocissimo!

translation.en: You think you're faster than me?
translation.it: Ti credi più veloce di me?

translation.en: -Where did you come from? -We snuck in. Very sneaky!
translation.it: E voi da dove venite? Ci siamo intrufolati. Molto subdolamente.

translation.en: So, think you could beat me in a race?
translation.it: Pensi di potermi battere in gara?

translation.en: -Yeah! -Uh, Nate?
-Wanna race me? -Yeah!
And whoever wins gets to keep all the Mighty Express cargo cars?
translation.it: Chi vince avrà tutti i vagoni del Mighty Express?

translation.en: Yeah! Wait, no!
Too late! It worked just like you said it would, Stella!
translation.it: Troppo tardi! Ha funzionato come avevi detto, Stella!

translation.en: -[giggles] Very sneaky. -That's my name!
translation.it: Molto subdolo. È il mio nome.

translation.en: You heard Nate! We're racing!
Whichever train picks up the animal feed
translation.it: Il treno che prende il mangime

translation.en: and delivers it to Farm Station first is the winner!
translation.it: e lo consegna per primo alla Fattoria è il vincitore.

translation.en: And when I win, Stella and I get all your cargo cars!
translation.it: E quando vincerò, io e Stella prenderemo tutti i vostri vagoni!

translation.en: All the cargo cars?! Not good, very bad!
translation.it: Tutti i vagoni? Non va bene. Molto male.

translation.en: And without my digger car, how can I, well... dig?
translation.it: Senza il mio scavatore, come posso… scavare?

translation.en: And without my animal car,
how can the Popstar Piggies get to their concerts?
translation.it: come vanno ai concerti i Maialini Superstar?

translation.en: They have a lot of concerts, y'all.
You two tricked Nate. That wasn't fair.
translation.it: Avete ingannato Nate! Non è giusto.

translation.en: It's okay, Max, I've got this!
I can beat Ricky with one wheel tied behind my caboose!
translation.it: Posso battere Ricky anche su una ruota sola.

translation.en: You guys believe in me, right?
Of course we do, Nate.
We've always got your back. It's just, are you sure you want to race?
translation.it: Siamo sempre con te. Ma sei sicuro di voler correre?

translation.en: Yes! I'm going to win!
Okay... the race is on!
But when Nate does win, you two have to feed all the farm animals!
translation.it: Ma quando Nate vincerà, voi due sfamerete tutti gli animali della fattoria.

translation.en: -All the farm an-- -Deal!
Wait, what?!
Okay, then, Nate, Ricky, now it's time to...
translation.it: Ok, allora. Nate, Ricky, è ora di…

translation.en: -Clean up. -Tune up.
-Hook up! -To the beat of my sweet track!
translation.it: - Agganciarsi… - Al ritmo della mia canzone.

translation.en: ♪ It's time to clean up ♪
♪ It's time to tune up ♪
♪ It's time to hook up ♪ ♪ Mighty Express ♪
It's wash time! Break it down!
♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub ♪
♪ Scrub, scrub-a-dub-dub ♪
♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub ♪
♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub ♪
That tickles!
♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub-dub ♪
♪ It's time to clean up ♪ ♪ It's time to tune up ♪
translation.it: È ora di lavarsi È ora di prepararsi

translation.en: [Liza] This is an extra special race tune-up!
translation.it: È una messa a punto speciale.

translation.en: ♪ Mighty Express ♪♪
Bye!
You are both Liza-certified racers!
[Max] And now it's time to hook up... with your racer cargo cars!
translation.it: È il momento dell'aggancio ai vagoni da corsa.

translation.en: Ricky has Stella with him to help, so I'll ride along with you, Nate!
translation.it: Ricky ha l'aiuto di Stella, quindi vengo con te, Nate.

translation.en: [Max] Now we're ready to...
[Nico] Not start yet!
Because you can't have a race without announcers!
translation.it: Perché non si può fare una gara senza annunciatori!

translation.en: Nate and Ricky, report to the starting line!
translation.it: Nate e Ricky, alla linea di partenza.

translation.en: This is it! The Main Train Event!
[Nico] The first ever Tracksville race is about to begin!
translation.it: La prima gara di BinarioCity sta per iniziare!

translation.en: So get ready to choo-choo!
The first train to deliver the animal feed to Farm Station
translation.it: Il primo treno a consegnare il mangime alla Fattoria

translation.en: will be the Mightiest Race Champion!
On your marks!
Get set...
[Stella] Go!
-Go! -Go!
[giggles] This is gonna be easy! [singing] Oh, yeah!
Jazz hands!
[Nate honks] Chugga-chugga zoom! See you at the finish line, Ricky!
translation.it: Ciuf-ciuf ya-hoo! Ci vediamo al traguardo.

translation.en: -Huh? -Step on it!
And they're off! Nate jumps out to an early lead!
translation.it: Partiti! Nate si porta in testa.

translation.en: Ricky's going to have to chugga-chugga and choo-choo if he wants to beat Nate!
translation.it: Ricky dovrà fare ciuf-ciuf se vuole battere Nate!

translation.en: We can catch up! We just need a sneaky shortcut!
translation.it: Possiamo raggiungerli. Ci serve una scorciatoia.

translation.en: One tricky shortcut coming up!
Hurry, before anyone sees!
It worked! We're ahead of Nate!
[Stella] Now, for part two.
I'll switch those signs!
Now, Nate will drive into the swamp, instead of going to Port Station!
translation.it: Ora Nate finirà nella palude invece di andare al Porto.

translation.en: Very sneaky!
And tricky!
-[uptempo music playing] -I'm Stella!
I'm Ricky!
I'm sneaky!
I'm tricky!
-I'm sneakier! -I'm the trickiest!
translation.it: Io sono più subdola. Io sono il più furbo!

translation.en: Huh. I thought Port Station was the other way. Me too.
-Maybe we should-- -Well, the sign can't be wrong!
translation.it: - Forse dovremmo… - Il cartello non sbaglia.

translation.en: The sign was wrong!
Stop, Nate, before you get stuck in the swamp!
translation.it: Fermo, Nate! Prima di finire nella palude!

translation.en: I won't get stuck.
I can go right through it, because I'm super fast and super strong!
translation.it: Posso superarla, perché sono super veloce e super forte.

translation.en: Fast, fast, faster!
Oops.
[Nico] We're coming to you live from the finish line at Farm Station
translation.it: Siamo in diretta dal traguardo della Stazione della Fattoria.

translation.en: and it looks like Nate's in a very sticky situation...
translation.it: E sembra che Nate si sia impantanato.

translation.en: Because he's stuck!
[man] Last time on "The Eggs of Our Lives."
translation.it: Nell'ultima puntata di Le Nostre Uova…

translation.en: -Sorry chickens, we need to see the race. -[clucking]
You can get out of the swamp, Nate! -[Liza] We believe in you! -[grunting continues]
translation.it: Puoi uscire dalla palude! Crediamo in te.

translation.en: I can't back out.
Oh! I know what to do! Mega stabilizer legs, activate!
translation.it: So cosa fare. Mega Piedi Stabilizzatori, attivati!

translation.en: Nice save! But I told you we'd get stuck.
translation.it: Bel colpo! Ma ti avevo detto che ci saremmo impantanati.

translation.en: Nothing to worry about, Max!
I had it covered. And now we're back in the race!
translation.it: Ce l'ho fatta e siamo di nuovo in gara!

translation.en: Those signs must have gotten switched somehow.
translation.it: I cartelli devono essere stati scambiati.

translation.en: [Nate] There!
Time to chugga-chugga zoom!
[Ricky] Approaching Port Station!
translation.it: In arrivo alla Stazione del Porto!

translation.en: -[dolphin trilling] -Hi, Tippers!
Ahoy!
Oh, and ahoy! Wow, the rare "double ahoy!"
translation.it: Ed ehilà! Wow, è raro un doppio ehilà.

translation.en: What?! Hey! How'd you get here so fast?
translation.it: Come siete arrivati così in fretta?

translation.en: You should be stuck in the swamp!
Uh... I mean, uh, stuck in second place!
translation.it: Dovreste essere nel pantano. Cioè… volevo dire lontano.

translation.en: How'd you know about the swamp?
[both] Lucky guess?
Your cargo's ready to cruise on out of here!
translation.it: Il vostro carico è pronto a partire.

translation.en: [Skipper] You each get two giant bags of animal feed.
translation.it: Ognuno ha due sacchi di mangime per animali.

translation.en: Me first!
-Thanks, Dipper! -It's Skipper!
Gotta go, I've got a race to win!
translation.it: Andiamo! Ho una gara da vincere.

translation.en: -Thanks, Skipper! -It's Skipper!
Oh, wait. That's what he said.
translation.it: Aspetta, è quel che ha detto.

translation.en: You're welcome!
[Nico] Stage one of the Mightiest Race is done!
translation.it: La prima fase della gara è finita

translation.en: And Ricky's ahead by a nose!
translation.it: e Ricky è in leggero vantaggio.

translation.en: [Nico] But will he maintain his lead?
Will Nate get stuck again?
-[Nico] So many questions! -[bleating]
Chickens!
And Tricky Ricky is in the lead!
translation.it: E Ricky il Furbo è in testa!

translation.en: And remember, if Ricky wins he gets... [gulp] ...all the Mighty Express train cars!
translation.it: Ricordate, se Ricky vince, prenderà tutti i vagoni del Mighty Express.

translation.en: [Stella gasps] Nate's gaining on us!
You've gotta go faster, Ricky!
Or be trickier!
Even Nate can't outrun an avalanche.
translation.it: Neanche Nate può superare una valanga!

translation.en: He's been tricked by Tricky Ricky!
translation.it: È stato ingannato da Ricky il Furbo!

translation.en: [singing] And Sneaky Stella! Jazz hands!
translation.it: E Stella la Subdola! Via alle danze.

translation.en: Nate's headed straight for an avalanche!
translation.it: Nate è diretto verso una valanga!

translation.en: Big trouble! I can't watch!
Nate! Watch out, avalanche!
No problem! I can bat those boulders away with my grabber claw!
translation.it: Nessun problema. Respingerò quei massi col mio artiglio.

translation.en: There are way too many! You have to dodge them.
translation.it: Ce ne sono troppi! Devi schivarli!

translation.en: Time for some boulder batting! Mega grabber claw, activate!
translation.it: È ora di battere i massi! Mega Artiglio, attivato!

translation.en: Boom! Home run! The crowd goes wild for Nate!
translation.it: Boom! Fuoricampo! La folla impazzisce per Nate!

translation.en: I knew there were too many to stop.
Nate! Use your stabilizer legs to push us out of here!
translation.it: Nate, usa i piedi stabilizzatori per spingerci.

translation.en: Maybe I can use my stabilizer legs to get us out!
Mega stabilizer legs, activate!
Up and over! Bye-bye, boulders!
translation.it: Un salto e via! Addio, massi!

translation.en: And Nate's made it past the boulders!
translation.it: E Nate ha superato i massi!

translation.en: He did?!
He did! Yes! Woo-hoo!
Huzzah!
[giggles] I mean, uh, I mean... -Excellent work, racer. -[giggling]
Nice job, Nate. But next time, try listening to me.
translation.it: Bravo, Nate! Ma la prossima volta ascoltami. Così eviteremo altri problemi.

translation.en: Maybe we'll avoid any more track trouble.
translation.it: Ma la prossima volta ascoltami. Così eviteremo altri problemi.

translation.en: It's alright, we're back in the race! Chugga-chugga zoom!
translation.it: Va bene. Siamo di nuovo in corsa. Ciuf-ciuf ya-hoo!

translation.en: We're in the lead! Oh, yeah!
[both] ♪ We're gonna win the race ♪ ♪ Yes we are ♪ ♪ We're gonna win every cargo car ♪
translation.it: Vinceremo la gara, sì Vinceremo tutti i vagoni

translation.en: ♪ And then Mighty Express Will be second best ♪
♪ To the Stella and Ricky superstars ♪ ♪ To the Ricky and Stella superstars ♪
translation.it: - Stella e Ricky superstar! - Ricky e Stella superstar!

translation.en: Yes! I'm catching up!
Oh, no! The avalanche didn't stop him!
translation.it: Oh, no! La valanga non l'ha fermato!

translation.en: Time to kick it into overdrive.
translation.it: È l'ora di mettere il turbo.

translation.en: Nate, you need to hit your brakes! That turn is too sharp, you're gonna--
translation.it: Nate! Devi frenare! Quella curva è troppo brusca. Stai per…

translation.en: Win the race! That's what I'm gonna do!
translation.it: Vincere la gara! Ecco cosa farò!

translation.en: Whoa!
Oh, no! Nate's derailed!
[Stella] See you at the finish line!
-[monitor chiming] -Nate, Max, come in! Are you okay?!
[sighs] Yeah, we're okay.
But I should've listened to Max about that turn.
translation.it: ma avrei dovuto ascoltare Max sulla curva,

translation.en: And the boulders. And the swamp.
translation.it: e i massi, e la palude.

translation.en: [sighs] Now Ricky and Stella are gonna win the race,
and everyone's gonna lose their cargo cars.
And it's all my fault, because I didn't listen!
translation.it: ed è colpa mia perché non ho ascoltato!

translation.en: The race isn't over until someone crosses the finish line.
translation.it: La gara non è finita fino al traguardo.

translation.en: You can still win!
You're right, Max!
But not listening to you keeps getting me in trouble.
translation.it: Ma non ascoltarti mi mette nei guai.

translation.en: So what should I do, Max, buddy?
If you use your stabilizer legs to jump toward that rock,
translation.it: Se usi i piedi stabilizzatori per saltare verso quella roccia,

translation.en: then grab it with your grabber claw, you might be able to swing us back up.
translation.it: poi la afferri con l'artiglio, potresti riportarci su.

translation.en: But you'll have to listen closely.
Chugga-chugga can do!
Mega grabber claw, activate!
Hold on tight! Here we go!
Grab it... ...now!
Chugga-chugga swing!
-Woo-hoo! -Awesome!
I wanna do that again! [chuckling]
[chuckles] Maybe another time!
We've got a race to win!
With Nate stuck on that ledge,
translation.it: Con Nate bloccato su quella roccia, possiamo andarci piano

translation.en: we can take it nice and slow, and still win!
translation.it: Con Nate bloccato su quella roccia, possiamo andarci piano e vincere comunque.

translation.en: Racing is so easy!
Hi! Bye!
Oh. Hi, Nate.
[both] Nate?! Go! Go! Go!
We're approaching the rope bridge!
You need to slow down when you go over it, so you don't derail again.
translation.it: Rallenta quando lo superi per non deragliare di nuovo.

translation.en: I'm listening to all your advice.
[singing] See you later!
Ricky, you're going too fast! It's not safe!
translation.it: Ricky! Vai troppo veloce. Non è sicuro.

translation.en: You're not gonna trick me! That's my job!
translation.it: Non mi inganni. È il mio lavoro.

translation.en: So... maybe Nate wasn't trying to trick me.
Hang on, I'm coming!
[Nate] Gotcha!
Phew! Thanks, Nate.
I know we're racing against each other, but I just want to say,
translation.it: So che stiamo gareggiando, ma voglio dirti con tutte le mie ruote…

translation.en: from the bottom of my wheels...
translation.it: ma voglio dirti con tutte le mie ruote…

translation.en: See you at the finish line!
[giggles] You've been tricked... -[Nate coughing] -...by Tricky Ricky!
translation.it: Siete stati ingannati da Ricky il Furbo!

translation.en: And Sneaky Stella! Jazz hands!
translation.it: E Stella la Subdola! Via alle danze!

translation.en: -That really was tricky! -And sneaky!
translation.it: È stato molto furbo. E subdolo.

translation.en: [both] That's our name!
Now I really, really, really want to win!
To the max!
Yeah! No way they're gonna get our cargo cars.
Chugga-chugga win!
[Nico] This is it! They're in the final stretch!
translation.it: Ci siamo! Siamo all'ultimo tratto. È Ricky in testa.

translation.en: It's Ricky in the lead. Now, it's Nate coming in from behind!
translation.it: Siamo all'ultimo tratto. È Ricky in testa. Ora Nate arriva da dietro. Ora Ricky. Ora Nate!

translation.en: [Nico] Now Ricky! Now Nate!
translation.it: Ora Nate arriva da dietro. Ora Ricky. Ora Nate!

translation.en: [Nico and Liza] Ricky! Nate! Ricky! Nate! Ricky! Nate!
translation.it: Ricky, Nate. Ricky, Nate. Ricky, Nate.

translation.en: [Liza] Look, here they come!
This is gonna be close! Goodbye sweet, sweet cargo cars!
translation.it: È un testa a testa! Addio, dolci vagoni merci!

translation.en: Huh?
Ricky's winning!
[all chanting] Go, Nate, go! Go, Nate, go!
translation.it: Vai, Nate, vai! Vai, Nate, vai!

translation.en: -[trains] Go, Nate, go! -[Milo] Come on, Nate, you've got this!
Now that's something I love to hear!
-I'm not letting my friends down! -[revving]
[Nate and Max] Oh, yeah!
-[crowd cheering] -[Milo] Good job, Nate!
Done and delivered!
Yeah! You did it!
We get to keep all our cargo cars!
-[Red] Well done, Nate! -[Milo] Well done, Nate! Woo-hoo!
You did it, Nate! You won!
Thanks, Max. I couldn't've done it without listening to you.
translation.it: Grazie, Max! Non ce l'avrei fatta senza ascoltarti.

translation.en: I can't believe we didn't win.
You know what that means!
Yeah! It means we're getting outta here!
translation.it: Sì, significa che ce ne andiamo!

translation.en: [Red] Not so fast!
As official race safety expert and rule keeper,
translation.it: In quanto ufficiale di sicurezza e custode delle regole,

translation.en: it is my duty to remind you that you must now keep the promise you made
translation.it: è mio dovere ricordarvi che dovete mantenere la promessa fatta a inizio gara.

translation.en: at the start of the race!
translation.it: che dovete mantenere la promessa fatta a inizio gara.

translation.en: In other words, y'all got some critters to feed!
translation.it: In altre parole, avete delle creature da sfamare.

translation.en: Okay, we can help!
Ah! Stop dancing on me!
Chicken on my head, chicken on my head!
translation.it: Pollo in testa! Pollo in testa!
